channel.title: 软餐 - 新鲜软件资讯
channel.description: 软餐 - 新鲜软件资讯 - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

item.title: Windows 虚拟机软件 NanaBox 支持 TPM 2.0
item.description:
软餐获悉，Windows 虚拟机软件 NanaBox 最近推出了对 TPM 2.0 的支持。NanaBox 是一款年轻的虚拟化软件，发布于 2022 年（GitHub）。最新版的 NanaBox 1.2 Update 2（1.2.797.0）在更新日志提及了上述改进：「此更新引入了对 Windows Server 2022 或更高版本主机操作系统中的虚拟机的受信任平台模块（TPM）2.0 支持。」

其同类软件 VirtualBox、VMware 等更早之前即已支持 TPM 2.0。

Windows virtual machine software NanaBox recently introduced support for TPM 2.0. NanaBox is a young virtualization software, released in 2022. The latest version of NanaBox 1.2 Update 2 (1.2.797.0) mentioned the above improvements in the update log: 「This update introduces support for Trusted Platform Module (TPM) 2.0 for virtual machines on Windows Server 2022 or later host operating systems.」

Similar software such as VirtualBox and VMware have supported TPM 2.0 earlier.

item.title: Win11 使用 AI 美化微软账户头像
item.description:
软餐获悉，在最新的 Windows 11 Canary build 26231 中，微软低调引入了一项隐藏功能，新版 Microsoft 账户头像编辑器使用 AI 技术来帮助用户美化头像，包括背景模糊、人像照明和放大等。此外还有一些用于基本编辑的内置滤镜。

In the latest Windows 11 Canary build 26231 , Microsoft quietly introduced a hidden feature, the new Microsoft account avatar editor that uses AI to help users enhance their profile pictures, including background blur, portrait lighting, and cropping. There are also some built-in filters for basic editing.

item.title: 两年间 Chrome 性能劲升超 70%
item.description:
谷歌透露，基于其最新的浏览器基准测试 Speedometer 3.0，从 Chrome 101 到 Chrome 127，该浏览器在近两年间里性能提高了 72%。浏览器基准测试 Speedometer 3.0 于今年发布，但它的开发始于 2022 年 5 月，从那时起，谷歌一直依赖该测试来提高 Chrome 的性能。

Google revealed that its browser has become 72% faster in the past two years, between Chrome 101 and Chrome 127 based on its latest browser benchmark, Speedometer 3.0. The browser benchmark, Speedometer 3.0 was released earlier this year, but its development began in May 2022, and since then, Google has been relying on it to improve Chrome’s performance.

item.title: 三星将为第三方应用程序引入「实时翻译」功能
item.description:
三星执行副总裁兼研发主管 Wonjoon Choi 透露，三星计划将 「实时翻译」（Live Translate）功能引入更多 Android 第三方应用程序。「实时翻译」 功能可帮助用户实时翻译电话通话，目前这项功能仅适用于三星自家的手机应用程序。Wonjoon Choi 没有公布哪款三方应用程序将获得实时翻译支持，有分析人士推测将包括 WhatsApp、Google Meet、KakaoTalk、Telegram 等。

三星同时表示，它将为即将推出的 Galaxy Z Fold6 和 Galaxy Z Flip6 「优化」Galaxy AI 功能。

Samsung plans to bring its 「Live Translate」 feature to more third-party Android apps, according to Executive Vice President and Head of R&D at Samsung, Wonjoon Choi. The Live Translate feature, which allows users to translate phone calls in real time, is currently only available as a native feature on Samsung’s own phone app. Choi didn’t say which third-party apps would get Live Translate support, though many have speculated that popular messaging apps and video calling apps such as WhatsApp, Google Meet, KakaoTalk, and Telegram would be included. Samsung also said that it will 「enhance」 its Galaxy AI feature further for the upcoming Galaxy Z Fold 6 and Galaxy Z Flip 6.

item.title: 苹果下周发布独立的密码管理器 App
item.description:
软餐获悉，彭博社记者马克·古尔曼（Mark Gurman）称，苹果公司将于 6 月 10 日在 WWDC 上推出自己的密码管理器。它将适用于 iOS 18、iPadOS 18 和 macOS 15。该密码管理器将被称为 「Passwords」，可与 iCloud 钥匙串配合使用。它跟踪所有设备上的用户密码，可以在 「设置」 中找到。该应用程序包括登录列表，并提供分类功能（例如帐户、Wi-Fi 网络和密钥），支持自动填充。它还可以在 Vision Pro 头显和 Windows 上运行。苹果希望借此为用户提供一个清晰的密码应用程序，以与 1Password 和 LastPass 等密码管理器竞争。

Apple will introduce its own password manager at WWDC on June 10, according to Bloomberg’s Mark Gurman. It will be available for iOS 18, iPadOS 18, and macOS 13. The password manager will be called 「Passwords」 and will work with the iCloud Keychain. It will keep track of users’ passwords across their devices and will be accessible in the Settings app. The app will feature a list of logins and will have an organizational structure (like accounts, Wi-Fi networks, and secure notes), complete with autofill support. It will also be available on the rumored mixed-reality headset and on Windows. With this move, Apple looks to provide users with a first-party password application to rival password managers like 1Password and LastPass.
